fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, review a player’s will. You may look over it and make edits if you wish, which your target cannot revert. Your target will be notified of your review, and of whether or not you made any edits.
- Once per game, you may choose to read aloud a previously reviewed player’s will during the day, informing everyone in the town about it. You will reveal yourself as the Testator in the process. If a player’s will is blank, you may not edit it or read it aloud.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Upon winning, you may post pictures of grapes in announcements. If you post anything besides grapes, your win is revoked and you die and lose the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Edit four people's wills and survive until the end of the game.
